issue.title: [CF 1395] UA counter issue
issue.body:
Trying to keep track of my active UA on target but this dont really work

[NumAura("Unstable Affliction", source="player", unit="target")] (tried with char name in source but nothing change). Any advice how to sort this? cheers


> Posted by CurseForge user Alsane | Imported from CurseForge issue #1395 | Raw

comments.body:
Make a buff/debuff icon for UA, put it in its own group, and make it a group controller.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Sorry, I didnt write the whole issue.

So counter of active UA works but problem is that it still show other warlocks UA in counter. (for example if I cast one UA and on target there are two UA from other warlock already it will display 3 instead of 1)

Here is preview how I configured it - http://prntscr.com/emzcj5


> Posted by CurseForge user Alsane

There is no source parameter on that tag. You can't use it for only your things.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
